name: Real World
creator: The God
description: The story takes place in the real world

name: Wonderland
creator: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll
description: Wonderland is a whimsical and fantastical world Alice enters through a rabbit hole. It's filled with talking animals, eccentric characters, and illogical situations.

name: Neverland
creator: Peter Pan by J.M. Barrie
description: Neverland is a magical island where children never grow up. It's home to Peter Pan, Tinker Bell, pirates, and various other fantastical creatures.

name: Oz
creator: The Wizard of Oz by L. Frank Baum
description: The Land of Oz is a colorful and vibrant realm with diverse regions like the Emerald City, Munchkinland, and the Winkie Country. Each area has its own unique inhabitants and challenges.

name: Narnia
creator: The Chronicles of Narnia by C.S. Lewis
description: Narnia is a mythical world accessed through a wardrobe or magical portals. It's a land of talking animals, mythical creatures, and epic battles between good and evil.
